tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is a friend more than a doctor.Each time I meet him,he has made my day with his professional behaviour and his colgate smile. While doing his work he will keep you busy with his conversation and by the time you realise the job is done,which is the best thing in him. He is one of the best few doctors available in Bangalore....thank you sir.
